snippet: The company focused on selling products from its more profitable downstream business, which includes truck wheels and aircraft fuselages.
abstract: Alcoa reports quarterly profit after a year-ago loss, as company focuses on selling products from its more profitable downstream business; Alcoa has earned $138 million, or 12 cents a share, compared with loss of $119 million, or a loss of 11 cents, year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The company focused on selling products from its more profitable downstream business, which includes truck wheels and aircraft fuselages.

headline.main: Alcoa Reports a Profit as Metals Prices Weaken
headline.print_headline: Alcoa Reports a Profit as Metals Prices Weaken
